name: @grndwork/api-client
description: API client for GroundWork Renewables Inc

scripts.update: updates --update --minor && (git diff-files --quiet package.json || (rimraf package-lock.json node_modules && npm install))
scripts.postupdate: git diff-files --quiet package-lock.json || (npm test -- --reporters=jest-simple-dot-reporter && npm run build:js)
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:py
scripts.pretest: pipenv run flake8 && pipenv run mypy src_py/grndwork_api_client && eslint src_ts
scripts.publish:py: pipenv run python3 -m twine upload dist_py/*
scripts.publish:test: pipenv run python3 -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist_py/*
scripts.test: npm run test:pytest && npm run test:jest
